title: Uruzgan Province
summary: Uruzgan (Pashto: اروزګان; Dari اروزگان), also spelled as Urozgan or Oruzgan, is one of the thirty-four provinces of Afghanistan. Uruzgan is located in the center of the country. The population is 436,079,[2] and the province is mostly a tribal society. Tarinkot serves as the capital of the province.
